name: Aesop & the Paradox Fable
description:
INTRODUCTORY NOTE: THIS IS A SUBMISSION TO THE GAME MOCK UP JAM.

That being the case this is just a prototype and not yet a game but more of a concept of a game I might want to make one day.

Most children in the village of Tudinidae grow up hearing fables from their parents. However, because of a failed experiment by his  distant father, Aesop is going to grow up living those fables! Follow along to this tale for a thrilling adventure RPG only for the Gameboy Color!

(Above is some concept art when I was brainstorming the idea.)

Aesop has 3 main forms in the game that you as the player must transform between to successfully finish your quest and save your little village. At times you must be a fool hardy kid with messy hair- yet once you have gotten yourself into a blunder too big transform into your Tortoise form to tank the hits. If all else fails transform into Rabbit form and swiftly carve a path for your journey to carry on.

The inspiration for this game mock up is I tried to imagine what kind of game my childhood friends and I would want to play on our gameboys after chess club.

If you could make a game what would it be like? I'd love to hear :D

I refuse for anyone to create derivative work from this concept since I may make this game one day... Thank you for understanding.
